dc:title: Republic Strikers Still Out/Day After Day
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Supports strikes but not using violence by strikers or company guards. Quotes Norman Thomas on our violent history. Keywords: non-violence, labor
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 906 1937-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
